txt.en: 'The Corsairs are building boats at Makham Jurrar, a small camp on the north side of Tol Fennas. They are not large themselves, but launched from some of the bigger craft, they could carry a great many Corsairs to shore, even in the shallows.\n\n'Find this camp and destroy the boats that are currently being constructed. You can take a craft from the harbour here in Dol Amroth to get to the island.'
Glíreth is in Dol Amroth.\n\nGlíreth will be pleased to hear the boats at Makham Jurrar have been destroyed.
The Corsairs have set up a lumber and shipyard camp on Tol Fennas, west of Dol Amroth.
'Fewer boats means fewer Corsairs on shore. Good work.'

Boats can be found at Makham Jurrar, the lumber and shipyard camp on the north side of Tol Fennas.\n\nGlíreth asked you to venture to Tol Fennas and destroy the boats being constructed there. A boat in the harbour of Dol Amroth can take you to Tol Fennas.
